articles.author: Erica Carbajal
articles.title: Patients with undetected heart failure have 5X greater COVID-19 death risk, study finds - Becker's Hospital Review
articles.description: Patients with early undetected heart failure who are hospitalized with COVID-19 are nearly five times more likely to die compared to patients with healthier heart measures, according to a study published May 10 in the American Heart Association's Hypertension…

articles.title: Maple Leafs’ Andersen rejoins team at practice after AHL conditioning loan - Sportsnet.ca
